attributes.action: to introduce new more stringent laws in the UK regarding the illegal use of hypnosis or other mind control techniques such as brainwashing etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to introduce new more stringent laws in the UK regarding the  use of any form of hypnosis or other mind control techniques such as brainwashing etc.That the use of any form of hypnosis ( subliminal or otherwise)on an individual(s) without their written consent will be regarded by the UK Courts as a criminal offence and also as a  breach of the current Human Rights Act with imprisonable sentences dependant upon the extent of the hypnosis or brainwashing techniques used referring to Patty Hearst as a prime example of such serious matters of hypnosis , brainwashing , Pavlovian conditioning , psychopolitics etc .
